name: v1_cars
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cars_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get detailed data on tens of thousands of vehicle models from dozens of automakers. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/cars.
API description: Fetches car details from the API Ninjas Cars API endpoint based on given search criteria.

model.description: Model of the vehicle. Default is 'corolla'.

max_city_mpg.description: Maximum city fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

min_comb_mpg.description: Minimum combination (city + highway) fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

max_hwy_mpg.description: Maximum highway fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

fuel_type.description: Type of fuel used. Possible values include 'gas', 'diesel', 'electricity'.

limit.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **5**

drive.description: Drive transmission. Possible values include 'fwd' (front-wheel drive), 'rwd' (rear-wheel drive), 'awd' (all-wheel drive), '4wd' (four-wheel drive).

max_comb_mpg.description: Maximum combination (city + highway) fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

transmission.description: Type of transmission. Possible values include 'manual', 'automatic'.

min_hwy_mpg.description: Minimum highway fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

min_city_mpg.description: Minimum city fuel efficiency in miles per gallon.

cylinders.description: Number of cylinders. Possible values include 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16.
